88.name: Leatherworker
88.requirement: Reach rating  in the leatherworker discipline.

105.name: Legendary Collector
105.description: Owner of some of the rarest items in Tyria.
105.requirement: Bind  unique legendary weapon or trinket.

133.name: Active Guild Member
133.description: You are part of the reason why your guild succeeds.

303.name: Take Everything in Sight
303.description: Our enemies can only hold out against you for so long.

310.name: Walls Get in the Way
310.description: Supply camps are impenetrable fortresses with you around.

363.name: Attend the Party
363.description: I hear the jokes are to die for!

404.name: PvP Daily Captures
404.description: This looks like a nice spot for a picnic.
404.requirement: Help capture a point in a PvP match.

423.name: Ring In the Season
423.requirement: Play the correct notes in Bell Choir Ensemble.

430.name: Wintersday Cheermeister
430.description: Skritt and melting snowflakes won't stop this present from being on time.
430.requirement: Spread joy atop the frigid heights of Winter Wonderland.

493.name: Skill Interrupter
493.requirement: Successfully interrupt a foe's skills by dazing, causing fear, knocking down, launching, pulling, pushing, or stunning your foe.

509.name: Event Mentor
509.requirement: Complete events while adjusted below your actual character level.

744.name: Gnashblade: Dungeon Runner
744.description: Don't be afraid of the dark.
744.requirement: Complete a dungeon while supporting Evon Gnashblade.

785.name: Krytan Torchbearer
785.requirement: Complete  Beacon of Kryta torch run.

819.name: Clockwork Chaos Completionist
819.requirement: Complete achievements from the original release of "Clockwork Chaos," or complete the Daily Portal Closer achievement.

bits.text: Defender of the Crown
Closing Ceremony Attendee
Opening Ceremony Attendee
Portal Closer
Swift Closer
Soft Lander
Watchwork Nightmare Wrecker
Molten Invader Menace
Scarlet Scrambler
Indiscriminate Adversary
Playhouse Perfectionist
Friend of Fire and Frost
Raced to the Rescue
Worldwide Invasion Responder
Was a Watchknight
Bane of Invading Captains
Daily Portal Closer
Invasion Canceler

872.name: Special Instruction
872.requirement: Follow the instructions given by the Genie of the Box.

876.name: Master of Baubles, World 2
876.requirement: Collect every World 2, Zone 3 bauble in one playthrough. Baubles from foes aren't counted.

932.name: Broken Clockwork
932.description: Time's up for this Scarlet minion.
932.requirement: Defeat the Clockwork Nightmare during the Twilight Assault.

1072.name: Toxic Gardener
1072.description: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1229.name: Aftermath Viathan Restorer II
1229.requirement: Complete  event in and around Viathan Lake in Kessex Hills.

1281.name: That Wintersday Ring IV
1281.requirement: Take part in the Wintersday Bell Choir.

1292.name: Silver for the Season
1292.requirement: Donate silver to either Ho-Ho-Tron or Marcello DiGiacomo in Lion's Arch.

1314.name: Marionette Muter
1314.requirement: Triumph in the fifth assault on the Twisted Marionette's power regulators without being downed or hit by its scream attack.

1362.name: Boss Thumper XXII
1362.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1636.name: Legendary Llama Locator
1636.requirement: Find the legendary llama hidden at the abandoned mine in Prospect Valley.

1715.name: Style Guide
1715.requirement: Collect and review various written works of Tyria.

1753.name: Dungeoneer
1753.description: <c=@flavor>"The dungeon you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek."</c>
1753.requirement: Collect the ascended accessories from each dungeon.

1773.name: Bonebreaker
1773.requirement: Defeat the Labyrinthine Horror in Mad King's Labyrinth.

1789.name: Recon Demolitionist
1789.requirement: Mine every possible corpse in Caithe's Reconnaissance Squad.

1874.name: Daily Goff's Loot Minidungeon
1874.requirement: Complete the Goff's Loot minidungeon in Kessex Hills.

1876.name: Daily Rebel's Seclusion Minidungeon
1876.requirement: Complete the Rebel's Seclusion minidungeon in Fireheart Rise.

1893.name: Daily Antre of Adjournment Jumping Puzzle
1893.requirement: Complete the Antre of Adjournment jumping puzzle in Malchor's Leap.

1902.name: Daily Loreclaw Expanse Jumping Puzzle
1902.requirement: Complete the Loreclaw Expanse jumping puzzle in Plains of Ashford.

1913.name: Daily Dark Reverie Jumping Puzzle
1913.requirement: Complete the Dark Reverie jumping puzzle in Caledon Forest.

1945.name: Daily Brisban Wildlands Event Completer
1945.requirement: Complete events in Brisban Wildlands in the Maguuma Jungle.

1949.name: Daily Southsun Cove Event Completer
1949.requirement: Complete events in Southsun Cove in Kryta.

2028.name: Toy Tonic Tippler
2028.description: Collect Tyria's Wintersday-themed endless toy transform tonics.
2028.requirement: Collect all  endless toy transform tonics.
2028.locked_text: Use a Fancy Holiday Tonic Cabinet, found in Wintersday Gifts.

2102.name: Daily Thief or Mesmer Winner
2102.requirement: Win  PvP match as a thief or mesmer.

2163.name: Adept Berserker
2163.requirement: Begin training the warrior's berserker elite specialization.

2211.name: Sky Stalker
2211.requirement: Defeat Axemaster Gwyllion after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

2250.name: HOPE IV: The Catalyst
2250.description: Let magical energy and alchemical potions combine as you bring the energies of asura and hylek together to create and charge a more perfect weapon, gaining the Gift of the Catalyst, the penultimate step in your journey to gain HOPE, the legendary pistol.

bits.text: Take the Charged Dwarven Spell Trap, Energized Soul Battery Fragment, Case of Corrupted Phials, and Chaotic Magic to the Metal Forest on Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap to combine them into Transcendent Energy.
Speak with Ogden, in the Durmand Priory within Lornar's Pass, to obtain this.
Activate the Dwarven Spell Trap before defeating the Fleshreaver inside the cave at Onager Bivouac in Fireheart Rise to collect its ancient magic.
Activate the Dwarven Spell Trap before defeating the Legendary Karka Queen in Southsun Cove to collect her ancient magic.
Activate the Dwarven Spell Trap before defeating Fleshgrazer inside Forsaken Fortune in Dredgehaunt Cliffs to collect its ancient magic.
Speak with Countess Anise in the Throne Room of Divinity's Reach to obtain the Soul Battery Fragment.
Activate the Soul Battery Fragment before defeating the Legendary Risen High Wizard at the Narthex in Cursed Shore to capture its soul energy.
Activate the Soul Battery Fragment before defeating the Risen King, located inside the Reliquary Vault of Cursed Shore, to capture its soul energy.
Activate the Soul Battery Fragment before defeating the Champion Risen Knight, located near the Dwayna Statue in Malchor's Leap, to capture its soul energy.
Activate the Soul Battery Fragment before defeating Karas the Undying, west of Rayhan Bayt in Malchor's Leap, to capture its soul energy.
Speak with the Priestess of Dwayna, at the Plaza of Dwayna in Divinity's Reach, to purchase Pure Crystalline Phials.
Corrupt a Pure Crystalline Phial in your inventory by defeating a Veteran Branded Spark found east of Skara Braevus in Blazeridge Steppes.
Corrupt a Pure Crystalline Phial in your inventory by defeating a Champion Icebrood Quaggan, one of which is located inside the cave in the south of Leopard's Tail Valley of Frostgorge Sound.
Corrupt a Pure Crystalline Phial in your inventory by defeating the Champion Risen Wraith at the Cathedral of Eternal Radiance in Malchor's Leap.
Corrupt a Pure Crystalline Phial in your inventory by defeating Vinetooth Prime inside Vinetooth's Den in Auric Basin.
Corrupt a Pure Crystalline Phial in your inventory by defeating the Shadow Behemoth when it arises in Godslost Swamp of Queensdale.
Combine five different corrupted crystalline phials into the Case of Corrupted Crystalline Phials.
Gather and combine the three chaotic energies with a piece of Crystallized Magic to create the Chaotic Magic.
Found by looting the chest in Spekk's Laboratory in Caledon Forest.
With the Crystallized Magic in your inventory, gather the searing's chaotic energy by looting the chest at the end of the Urban Battlegrounds Fractal.
With the Crystallized Magic in your inventory, gather chaotic ectoplasmic energy by looting the Ascalonian ghosts found at the Old Piken Ruins in Iron Marches.
With the Crystallized Magic in your inventory, gather chaotic ley-line energy by defeating earth elementals near Omadd's Machine within the Cavern of the Shining Lights in Dry Top.

Take the Concentrated Volatile Substance, Ichor Alkahest, Arachnid Venom Decanter, and Concentrated Maguuma Bacteria to the Alchemy Mixing Table near Atlalli, Master Alchemist in the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls, to create the Alchemical Catalyst.
With an Empty Hylek Flask in your inventory, mix the four volatile ingredients to form the Concentrated Volatile Substance.
Recipe purchased from Atlalli, Mastery Alchemist at the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls.
A volatile ingredient looted from the Veteran Matriarch after rescuing Wark from the infatuated harpy inside the western ruins of the Shattered Palisades in Blazeridge Steppes.
A volatile ingredient occasionally looted from toxic oozes.
A volatile ingredient looted from Vilnia Shadowsong near the Raven Shaman's Power Source hidden within Darkhoof Heights in Snowden Drifts.
A volatile ingredient looted from the Mordrem Wyvern at Matriarch's Perch in Verdant Brink.
With an Empty Hylek Flask in your inventory, mix all four ichors together to create the Ichor Alkahest.
Speak with Atlalli, the Mastery Alchemist at the Hunting Grounds in Timberline Falls, to learn his secret ichor extraction technique.
After learning the special technique, achieve a rank of silver or better in the Haywire Punch-o-Matic Battle adventure within the Rata Novus Lane of Tangled Depths to gather the chak's ichor.
After learning the special technique, defeat the Champion Wasp Queen near the Ebonhawke Delegation in Fields of Ruin to gather her ichor.

After learning the special technique, defeat the Champion Branded Devourer Queen inside the Infestation in Iron Marches or the Champion Giant Branded Devourer in Sniper's Woods in Fields of Ruin to gather the ichor.
After learning the special technique, defeat the Legendary Chak Gerent in Tangled Depths to gather its ichor.
With an Empty Hylek Flask in your inventory, mix the four spider venoms to create the Arachnid Venom Decanter.
Speak with Eda in Queensdale to learn her spider venom extraction technique.
After learning the special technique, defeat Gargantula inside the cave at Wynchona Woods in Harathi Hinterlands and loot her venom.
After learning the special technique, defeat the Toxic Spider Queen just north of the Togatl Grounds in Kessex Hills and loot her venom.
After learning the special technique, defeat the Canyon Spider Queen located inside the Sweltering Canyons of Fireheart Rise and loot her venom.
After learning the special technique, defeat the Enraged Spider Queen outside the mansion of Almuten Estates in Gendarran Fields and loot her venom.
Speak with Jett, along the southern road exiting Griffonfall in Auric Basin, to obtain the M-PEC.
With an Empty Hylek Flask in your inventory, mix the six jungle bacteria to create the Concentrated Maguuma Bacteria.
Activate the M-PEC before defeating a Champion Mushroom Emperor in Tangled Depths, Auric Basin, or Dragon's Stand to gather its spores.
Activate the M-PEC before defeating a Veteran Bloodsucker inside the caves of Auric Basin to gather its enzymes.
Activate the M-PEC before defeating the Veteran Follower of Zintl outside the Capitzel Grounds in Auric Basin to gather their beetle's juice.
Activate the M-PEC before defeating a Veteran Deep Cave Troll found inside the damp caverns in either Auric Basin or Tangled Depths to gather its saliva.
Activate the M-PEC before defeating a Champion Arrowhead at Arrowhead Vale in Auric Basin to gather its mucus.
Activate the M-PEC before defeating a Champion Stonehead near the Griffonfall Pylon in Auric Basin to gather its salivary stone.

To complete the Catalytic Converter, combine the jungle dragon cores with the Incomplete Catalytic Converter and a Vision Crystal by channeling the Ancient Power Core inside the secret lab beneath the Decayed Hive in Tangled Depths.
Speak with G.O.X. 2.0 at Zinn's Office, located inside the Rata Novus Command Center in Tangeled Depths, to gain the Incomplete Catalytic Converter.
After obtaining the incomplete catalytic converter, gather the Blademaster's jungle dragon core by defeating Mordremoth's commander near the Central Blighting Tower in Dragon's Stand.
After obtaining the incomplete catalytic converter, gather the Axemaster's jungle dragon core by defeating Mordremoth's commander near the Southern Blighting Tower in Dragon's Stand.
After obtaining the incomplete catalytic converter, gather the Stavemaster's jungle dragon core by defeating Mordremoth's commander near the Northern Blighting Tower in Dragon's Stand.
After obtaining the incomplete catalytic converter, gather Mordremoth's core by slaying the Elder Dragon in Dragon's Stand.
Gather four soul energies to power the Soul Battery Fragment.
Use the Dwarven Spell Trap after gathering the three ancient magics to completely charge it.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Scholar of Secrets ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2264.name: Torn from the Sky
2264.description: Journal: Torn from the Sky Completed
2264.requirement: Search for survivors in the wreckage of the Pact fleet.

2352.name: Lord of the Jungle
2352.description: Loincloths will be all the rage next season...
2352.requirement: Heal or enhance Lord Faren to support his training.

2434.name: BUY-2046 PFR's Challenge #103
2434.description: Once you've proven your fractal prowess, BUY-2046 PFR will sell you Fractal Gear Boxes containing your choice of fractal weapon skins.
2434.requirement: Complete difficulty scale 50 in the Fractals of the Mists.

2442.name: Luminate's Backplate
2442.requirement: Collect all  items to forge the ascended backpack, Luminate's Backplate.

bits.text: Found on ore nodes in Auric Basin. Requires training Exalted Gathering in the Exalted Lore Mastery line.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Earn silver or better in this adventure.

2490.name: Glittering Weapon Collection
2490.requirement: Unlock all  Glittering weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2566.name: Sky Commander
2566.requirement: Defeat all nightfall bosses in Verdant Brink.

bits.text: Defeated Mordrem Tetrad
Defeated Cotoni and Huetzi
Defeated Wyvern Matriarch
Defeated Wyvern Patriarch
Defeated Axemaster Gwyllion

2617.name: "Straight and Narrow" Strongbox
2617.requirement: Search in the Tarnished Treetop area for the strongbox from the "Straight and Narrow."

2658.name: Flee the Storm
2658.requirement: Avoid getting hit by Magic Storm, and then defeat the Vale Guardian.

2668.name: My Hero!
2668.requirement: Free or speak to all nearby Pact prisoners after defeating Sabetha.

2701.name: League Conqueror—Elite
2701.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory.

2715.name: Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory
2715.requirement: Complete all 11 Path of Ascension IV achievements.

2798.name: Shattering Setup
2798.requirement: Use the mortar, turret, and jump pad at Lowland Burns during the Shatterer fight.

2836.name: Avenger of the Pact
2836.requirement: Slay Matthias and liberate the Pact squad leader.

2870.name: Course Work: Super Adventure Festival
2870.requirement: Complete three daily achievements in Super Adventure Box. Completion will earn progress in the Course Load achievement, located in the Super Adventure Box: Nostalgia achievement tab.

2894.name: Fractal Adept
2894.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 26 to 50.

2908.name: Daily Tier 2 Volcanic
2908.requirement: Complete Volcanic at fractal scale 26 or higher.

3035.name: Flinnz's Retirement
3035.requirement: In Blazeridge Steppes, successfully stop the Inquest from capturing  ley-line coalescences after contributing ley energy to the Consortium.

3116.name: Ember Bay Insight: Ashen Skerries
3116.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Ember Bay.

3127.name: Patron
3127.requirement: Purchase a patronage contract from the ringmaster.

3133.name: Metal Mountain
3133.requirement: Find the tallest, hottest spot on Ember Bay!

3138.name: Igneous Breach
3138.requirement: Help the asuran scout find out what's going on in the skritt pirate camp on the shores of Igneous Breach.

3202.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 57
3202.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3204.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 74
3204.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3256.name: Open Letters
3256.requirement: Investigate posters and secret letters in Kryta to keep up to date on the latest gossip.

bits.text: Queensdale: Shire of Beetletun
Kessex Hills: Viathan's Arm
Gendarran Fields: Ascalon Settlement
Harathi Hinterlands: Arca Lake
Queensdale: Shaemoor Fields
Hidden among bandit supplies in Kryta.
Hidden among bandit supplies in Kryta.
Hidden among bandit supplies in Kryta.
Hidden among bandit supplies in Kryta.
Hidden among bandit supplies in Kryta.

3260.name: Wintersday Wrecking Ball
3260.description: Nothing a little tape and some glue can't fix.
3260.requirement: Destroy every miniature piece of Tixx's toy diorama in Tixx's Infinirarium. (Dungeon instance only; not in the Toypocalypse activity.)

3279.name: Dragon's Heart
3279.requirement: Gain health while in the Dragon Ball arena.

3287.name: Attuned
3287.requirement: Defeat the Mursaat Overseer game piece while the challenge mote is active.

3306.name: Fire Brigade
3306.requirement: Put out fires left burning around Lake Doric after the White Mantle's assault.

3336.name: Kyhlo Assaulter
3336.requirement: Neutralize  enemy capture point during Battle of Kyhlo rated matches.

3416.name: Daily Draconis Mons Unbound Magic Gatherer
3416.requirement: Gather unbound magic from the sky in Draconis Mons.

3431.name: Draconis Mons Insight: Western Boiling Sea
3431.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Draconis Mons.

3440.name: Rock Collector
3440.description: Taimi's research might benefit from these.
3440.requirement: Collect all the stray firestone shards.

bits.text: Savage Rise: In a cave behind the Rolling Devil nest.
Titan's Throat: Underneath and to the east of the gate of fire.
Heathen's Hold: High above Prisoner's Perch, near a Mastery Insight.
Heathen's Hold: Atop a plateau above Iota Vault.
Scalding Gorge: On a ledge high above, north of Sandstone Archway.
Scalding Gorge: On a ledge high above, west by northwest of Sandstone Archway.
Scalding Gorge: On a ledge high above, northwest of Sandstone Archway.
Rata Arcanum: In a high nook, east of Seething Pillar.
Titan's Throat: On the northeastern side, just below the gate of fire.
Titan's Throat: On the northeastern side, a little lower below the gate of fire.
Heathen's Hold: Below the lava river, on the west side.
Scalding Gorge: Atop a tall stone outcropping, southeast of Sandstone Archway.
Scalding Gorge: Hidden below Sandstone Archway, on the eastern side.
Scalding Gorge: On the underside of Sandstone Archway.
Rata Arcanum: Underneath a large firestone spire.
Wind Rider Ledge: In a ceiling cave below Rata Arcanum.
Wind Rider Ledge: Near the ceiling along the western wall.
Wind Rider Ledge: On the northern side, in a ceiling crevasse.
Wind Rider Ledge: High along the wall, southwest of Seething Pillar.
Wind Rider Ledge: Embedded high in a large palm tree.
Mariner Landing: In a nook high along the western wall.
Western Boiling Sea: On the underside of Wind Rider Ledge.
Western Boiling Sea: On the side of the foot of Wind Rider Ledge.
Mariner Landing: In plain view near Sub Landing.
Western Boiling Sea: Just below the Mastery Insight.
Western Boiling Sea: Along a ledge northwest of Seething Pillar.
Western Boiling Sea: On a stone outcropping east of Seething Pillar.
Eastern Boiling Sea: On an island northwest of Frothing Pedestal.
Eastern Boiling Sea: On the ceiling of a cave along the northern wall.
Ancient Hollow: Deep in a shallow cave southeast of the golem graveyard.
Ancient Hollow: In a nook in a wall, north of a mushroom village.
Savage Rise: At the source of the waterfall at Peace Grounds.
Golemancer's Tomb: In a cave outside the tomb, high above Scout's Clearing.
Golemancer's Tomb: Embedded in the wall outside the tomb, high above Scout's Clearing.
Rata Arcanum: In the upper area, atop a small spire.
Rata Arcanum: In a nook behind the Inquest's captive druid.
Rata Arcanum: Overlooking the Inquest's portal.
Wind Rider Ledge: In a cranny above the northern tip of the ledge.
Rata Arcanum: In a nook near some soil in the caves behind Rata Arcanum.
Heathen's Hold: In a mercenary's bucket.
Golemancer's Tomb: At the tip of a long, thin outcropping outside the southern entrance to the tomb.
Savage Rise: In a cranny within the bristleback's nest.
Heathen's Hold: Within a crevasse in Iota Vault.
Heathen's Hold: Above the entrance to Iota Vault.
Heathen's Hold: In the rocks on the wall north of Iota Vault.
Savage Rise: A cave in the ceiling below Heathen's Hold waypoint.
Scalding Gorge: In a slit in the rocks looking north from atop the northwestern arch.
Heathen's Hold: Under the grating.
Golemancer's Tomb: In a crack in the ceiling, in the room across from the champion devourer. Bring an Oakheart's essence.
Rata Arcanum: A crack in the ceiling in the caves behind Rata Arcanum.
Savage Rise: Underneath an outcropping north of Scout's Clearing.
Heathen's Hold: Beneath a massive defense turret, on the east shore of the lava river.
Savage Rise: Near the base of a massive rocky pillar, southwest of the Peace Grounds.
Rata Arcanum: On a rock wall, just outside the entrance to the Inquest Field Lab.
Ancient Hollow: Along a path that runs northeast toward a mushroom village.
Ancient Hollow: Toward the western edge of the land mass. Fireflies make their home nearby.
Mariner Landing: On the ceiling of a dark tunnel. Reef riders stand guard outside.
Mariner Landing: Atop a diagonal cliff face. Reef riders float nearby.
Savage Rise: At the entrance to a ramp that leads to Scout's Clearing.
Mariner Landing: Near a thermal tube, south of Sub Landing.

3462.name: Precision Blade
3462.description:
Story Instance: Shining Blade Secrets

"I will slit your traitorous throat! To arms!"
—Exemplar Kerida
3462.requirement: Kill 50 White Mantle invaders at the Henge of Denravi.

3572.name: Vehjin Supply Run: Gold
3572.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Vehjin Supply Run adventure.

3583.name: Rune-locked Doors
3583.requirement: Find runestones throughout the Derelict Delve to unlock all the mysterious doors.

3627.name: Skimming the Surface
3627.requirement: Unlock the skimmer by completing the Skimmer Ranch task region in the Elon Riverlands and purchasing a skimmer saddle from Ardra.

3641.name: Destroy Additional Pylons
3641.requirement: Destroy all of the Forged Pylons, preceding the Warbeast, in the "Beast of War" chapter without dying.

3692.name: Domain of Vabbi Insight: Yahnur Sandfall
3692.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Domain of Vabbi.

3710.name: Crystal Oasis Insight: Imed's Grotto
3710.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Crystal Oasis.

3716.name: Elona Safari Hunter
3716.description: Where the predators become the prey.

3726.name: Shields On
3726.requirement: Always protected by Crystal Shield when Facet of Glint casts Crystalline Drain.

3747.name: Refugee Supply Run: Gold
3747.requirement: Gather relief supplies for the refugees before time runs out!

3791.name: Daily Desolation Taskmaster
3791.description: Always happy to lend a hand.
3791.requirement: Complete a task region in the Desolation.

3799.name: Garden Supply Run: Silver
3799.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Garden Supply Run adventure.

3811.name: Elite Elimination
3811.requirement: Defeat the three elite patrol groups wandering the Salt Flats within 3 minutes of leaving the outpost.

3824.name: Court Is Adjourned
3824.requirement: Successfully defeat High Judge Kulul, High Judge Ejele, and High Judge Sidan in the Necropolis.

bits.text: High Judge Kulul
High Judge Sidan
High Judge Ejele

3871.name: Jackal Reconnaissance
3871.requirement: Now that you have your jackal, you can gain tasty treats for it as a reward for helping locals.

bits.text: Sent from Drojkor in Sand Jackal Run as a thanks for finishing the task region.
Received from Drojkor in Sand Jackal Run as a thanks for helping his undercover associates.
Received from Aisha Jedgok at the Lair of the Forgotten's entrance in thanks for returning a sulfuric sample to her.
Received from Nori Mahat near the village of Purity's tents in thanks for returning Awakened intel to him.
Received from Ahel Nakat in the Ruination's Order of Shadows target range as a thanks for returning a piece of Forged armor to him.
This was found in the middle of the Ruptured Heart. Return it to Ahel Nakat in the Ruination's Order of Shadows target range.
This was found on some bones in Acrid Springs. Return it to Aisha Jedgok in the Lair of the Forgotten.
This was found in an Awakened outpost tent at the entrance of the Scourgeway. Return it to Nori Mahat in the village of Purity.

3942.name: Pumpkin Carving
3942.description: Made in the Mad King's own image.
3942.requirement: Find pumpkins all around Tyria and carve them.

4223.name: Whistling in the Dark
4223.requirement: Successfully defend Canach while he arms the bomb in under six minutes.

4233.name: The Tyrian Service Medal
4233.requirement: Acquire all the available medals from the Tyrian campaign.

bits.text: Defeat the Shadow Behemoth in Queensdale
Defeat the fire elemental in Metrica Province.
Defeat the Shatterer in Blazeridge Steppes.
Defeat the Great Jungle Wurm in Caledon Forest
Defeat Tequatl the Sunless in Sparkfly Fen.
Defeat the Inquest's Golem Mark II in Mount Maelstrom
Defeat the Claw of Jormag in Frostgorge Sound.
Assist in retaking the Cathedral of Glorious Victory.
Assist in retaking the Cathedral of Eternal Radiance.
Assist in retaking the Cathedral of Zephyrs.
Assist in retaking the Cathedral of Verdance.
Assist in retaking the Cathedral of Silence.

4243.name: Dexterous and Flexible
4243.requirement: Avoid every laser trap in the Moon Fortress.

4256.name: [FTT 201–407] Practicum in Advanced Dynamics
4256.requirement: Tinker with turrets by building and upgrading them to discover new upgrades.
4256.locked_text: A basic understanding of field tech turret dynamics is required.

4306.name: Gauntlet Favorite
4306.requirement: Defeat  Queen's Gauntlet boss in the Crown Pavilion during the Festival of the Four Winds with at least one gambit active.

4335.name: Guide to Greater Understanding
4335.description: Combine 2 Lesser Vision Crystals with 3 Vials of Blood, 6 Sapphire Orbs, and 15 Globs of Ectoplasm in the Mystic Forge to create an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal.
4335.requirement: Show Xeniph the hope of a brave new world.
4335.locked_text: Create and consume an Ectoplasm-Infused Vision Crystal to begin this journey.

bits.text: This vision crystal is imbued with ectoplasm, enabling the user to see deeper through the veil.
First, in Fields of Ruin: Go where the mightiest of the walled city rest.
Then, in Fields of Ruin: At the top of an abandoned mine, discover precarious pillars of steel...
Then, in Fields of Ruin: Seek out shattered storms, a twisting tree, and roots deep in stone.
Then, in Fields of Ruin: A waterfall streams forth with a stone ceiling overhead.
Then, in Fields of Ruin: Find the southernmost point, where one is closest to the sands beyond.
Finally, in Fields of Ruin: Embue an Oiled Orichalcum Greatsword Blade to become something more—a blade of a different age, forged by one long passed.

4362.name: The Convergence of Sorrow II: Requiem
4362.description: <c=@Flavor>Disruption of the Mists threatens past and present, but kindness reverberates through time.</c>
4362.requirement: Undo Kralkatorrik's damage to the flow of time around the Ancestor Tree.

bits.text: Speak to one djinn about another djinn.
Present a djinn with impossible information.
Bridge the cultural divide of time.
Find defenses for the defenseless.
Give a family of history the ability to survive.
Listen to a tall tale of ancient times.
Listen to a taller tale of ancient times.
Return to our time through a traveler of rifts.
This piece of armor looks vaguely familiar.
Some institution might be interested in this historical and arcane artifact.
Assist your research partner.
Agent Kito collects secrets and mysteries.
Assist your research partner.
Village Head Azi knows about all kinds of strange happenings.
Assist your research partner.
Warmaster Steelburn takes scrap metal for her camp.
Assist your research partner.
Trader Hyacinth deals in all kinds of exotic goods.
Assist your research partner.
Possibly picked up by a Shatterer on its journeys.
Assist your research partner.

4394.name: Jahai Bluffs Griffon Expert: Gold
4394.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

4437.name: Royal Racer
4437.requirement: Finish a race or time trial in the Mad King's Raceway.

4459.name: Death in Yasmi's Name
4459.description: Yasmi has reveled in the blood you've spilled.
4459.requirement: Defeat  player during Djinn's Dominion rated matches.

4462.name: Rolling Competitor: Lakeside Loop
4462.requirement: Complete 15 laps of the roller beetle race in Gendarran Fields. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4505.name: Chasing Tales: Unscarred
4505.description: Despite a lifetime of war, her skin bore not a single scar.
4505.requirement: Slay 10 enemies in a row with a longbow without taking damage between kills in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Azra the Sunslayer.
Slay 10 enemies in a row with a longbow without taking damage between kills in Thunderhead Peaks.

4532.name: One Big Ugly
4532.requirement: Defeat Volatile Oil Slug Sulypix on the ice floe.

4551.name: Daily Tier 1 Siren's Reef
4551.requirement: Complete Siren's Reef at fractal scale 1 or higher.

4565.name: Daily Thunderhead Peaks Adventurer
4565.requirement: Complete an adventure within Thunderhead Peaks.

4611.name: Chasing Tales: Deadeye
4611.description: Durio had three rules: no sniveling, no witnesses, and never obey rules.
4611.requirement: Inflict blindness on 10 enemies while wielding a pistol in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Durio the Contemptuous.
Inflicted blindness on 10 enemies while wielding a pistol in Thunderhead Peaks.
Verdance Falls, in the heart of Melandru's Chalice.
West of a lost wing.
A mystical grotto in the Skein.
Near the Pact, protected by three pairs of fangs.
Near Pact and Skein, guarded by the trees.
The Gnarlgrove, where Melandru sleeps.
The Mosswood, where Howling is heard on the wind.
In Melandru's Chalice, an inlet betwixt great roots.
A hidden grove in Melandru's Chalice.

4734.name: Melandru's Lost Domain Slayer
4734.requirement: Slay  foes within Melandru's Lost Domain in Dragonfall.

4763.name: Mystic Forge "Researcher" II
4763.requirement: Donate goods to the "very scientific" research into the Mystic Forge's secrets in Lion's Arch.

4829.name: Burn Them All
4829.requirement: Participate in the old Dragon Bash tradition of immolating dragon effigies.

4844.name: Paper Smasher
4844.requirement: Gain a medal from the Piñata Bashing adventure in Hoelbrak.

4852.name: Bonus Event: World Boss Rush
4852.description: Defeat world bosses around Tyria to earn bonus rewards!

4920.name: Amateur Mixologist
4920.requirement: Serve 30 drinks in the Rank 'n' File Pub.

4986.name: Teacher's Assistants
4986.requirement: Kill 250 of Kasmeer's illusions in her training event.

5072.name: Mythic Weapon Collection
5072.requirement: Unlock all  Mythic weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5122.name: Cataclysm
5122.requirement: Use the Spirit Nova, Night Terror, or Shattered Psyche essence manipulation ability on Drakkar.

5217.name: Mission Challenge: Horde of Foes
5217.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with the Horde of Foes challenge active.

5355.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Flight of the Eagle Spirit
5355.requirement: Complete the Flight of the Eagle Spirit adventure in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

5364.name: Death to the Corrupted
5364.requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

5376.name: Olaf Olafson's Secret
5376.requirement: Explore the entirety of Drizzlewood Coast, and find the map pieces to discover Olaf Olafson's treasure key.

bits.text: Clue 1: From the lighthouse, head north.
Clue 2: Upon reaching the arch, head west.
Clue 3: Go beyond the crag.
Clue 4: Stop at the falls.
Clue 5: Look in the center of six guardians.

5411.name: Drizzlewood Coast Combatant
5411.requirement: Complete 2 story journal chapters in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5421.name: Drizzlewood Coast Insight: Falls
5421.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5429.name: Intel Collector
5429.requirement: Unlock  special missions by using Charr Intel Documents and Enemy Intel Documents.

bits.text: Special Mission: Blast Them All
Special Mission: Behold the Power of Healing Rockets
Special Mission: Shoot to Thrill
Special Mission: Apply Directly to Forehead
Special Mission: No Charr Left Behind
Special Mission: Bullets and Beans
Special Mission: Explosive Situations
Special Mission: Break Their Toys
Special Mission: Must Have Been the Wind
Special Mission: Declawed
Dominion Special Mission: Northern Supply Lines
Dominion Special Mission: Decimate Their Ranks
Dominion Special Mission: Raze Their Camps
Dominion Special Mission: Cut Off Their Heads
Corrupted Special Mission: The Old Guard
Corrupted Special Mission: The Fallen
Corrupted Special Mission: The Aberrant
Corrupted Special Mission: Shut the Doors
Corrupted Special Mission: Cleanse the Corruption

5481.name: Daily Metrica Province Dragon Response Mission
5481.requirement: Complete the Metrica Province Dragon Response Mission.

5495.name: Special Ops Basic Course 1
5495.requirement: Complete the assigned tasks to acquire the Special Ops Boot Locker.
5495.locked_text: Learn all you can from Captain Wing Jun in Gyala Delve to unlock.

5633.name: Master of Draconic Ice
5633.requirement: Unlock  Icy Dragon Slayer weapon skin in your wardrobe.

5831.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Twenty-Seven
5831.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Seven.

5891.name: Revenge of Warden Amala
5891.requirement: Defeat Warden Amala during the Sunspear Uprising meta-event.

5915.name: Return to Seized
5915.requirement: Complete the story mission Seized in Living World Season 4 Episode 3.

6010.name: Second Response: Lake Doric
6010.requirement: Complete the Lake Doric Dragon Response Mission.

6125.name: Laser Show-Off
6125.requirement: Make it to the workshop without being hit by laser or shock-wave turrets.

6134.name: Your Kind of People
6134.description: Journal: Your Kind of People Completed
6134.requirement: Investigate what's happening in Shing Jea.

6163.name: Ministry-Approved Mechanist
6163.requirement: Purchase these  trinkets from the strike rewards vendor.

6166.name: Friends of a Feather
6166.requirement: Complete the Mori Village renown heart.

bits.text: Arrows
Food
Blankets

6170.name: Hold Out
6170.requirement: Keep the Jade Brotherhood and Speaker allies alive while fighting the fallen spirits.

6286.name: Daily Shiverpeaks Fisher
6286.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
6286.requirement: Gather raw materials by catching fish in the following locations: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, or Frostgorge Sound.

6366.name: Aetherblade Cleanup
6366.requirement: Defeat each of the Aetherblade lieutenants during the Seitung Province meta-event.

bits.text: Haunted Aetherblade
Aetherblade Rampager
Aetherblade Assassin

6377.name: Dodger of Darkness
6377.requirement: Evade the grasping darkness in Zen Daijun's maze.

6383.name: Theft Deterrence
6383.requirement: Prevent the Speakers from stealing any relics during the relic raid event.

6603.name: League Participator—2v2 Season Seven
6603.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Seven.

6643.name: Defeating the Grawl, Hylek, Dredge, and Krait
6643.requirement: Defeat  grawl, hylek, dredge, or krait enemy.

6656.name: Completing Events V
6656.requirement:
Participate in  event in the Ruins of Orr, Frostgorge Sound, or Southsun Cove.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events in progress are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

6689.name: The Opening Ceremony
6689.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Opening Ceremony.

6734.name: Viewing Vistas V
6734.requirement:
View / vista in Ruins of Orr or Frostgorge Sound.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6884.name: Collapsing Star Weapon Collection
6884.requirement: Unlock all  Collapsing Star weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6895.name: Triple Bypass
6895.requirement: During the final battle of Gyala Delve, destroy all three haze hearts during a single window of opportunity.

6962.name: Zojja's Journal: Skyward Marches
6962.requirement: Collect all of Zojja's journal pages in the Skyward Marches fractal.
6962.locked_text: Unlock by starting the Zojja's Journal collection.

bits.text: Restore purpose to the Zaishen of Skyward Marches.
Page Location: Skyward Marches, at the ward's western camp.
Page Location: Skyward Marches, where a cliff overlooks good and evil.
Page Location: Skyward Marches, atop a village building caressed by the wind.

6988.name: Wrong Time, Wrong Place
6988.description: Hopefully it was quick and painless...

7019.name: Wizard's Tower: Skyscale Target Practice—Master
7019.requirement: Finish the Wizard's Tower: Skyscale Target Practice adventure with all targets destroyed.

7037.name: The Waylit Lantern
7037.requirement: Help Lyhr reclaim a lost relic.

bits.text: Speak to Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower.
Retrieve Lyhr's Relic by defeating the Avatars of Rage and Regret in the Bastion of Balance.
Return to Lyhr.
Gain favor with Elrik by defeating the possessed dwarf at Droknar's Forge.
Speak with Elrik.
Get a history lesson from a dwarf at the Durmand Priory Headquarters.
Find Novice Taeya in Lornar's Pass near Guutra's Homestead.
Speak to Timin Blastburl near Dwarves' Gloaming.
Help collect dwarven artifacts.
Return to Timin.
Speak to Von Delverunner inside King Jalis's Refuge.
Seek out dwarves investigating the Forsaken Halls in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Find Riley Waylit in Nakrojos Pass.
Return to Lyhr.

7066.name: Wizard's Tower: Fly by Night—Silver
7066.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Wizard's Tower: Fly by Night adventure.

7098.name: Astral Bearing
7098.requirement: Gather the necessary armor skins and defeat Galene the Seething to unlock the ability to purchase the Arcanum of Astral Bearing from Lyhr, the wizard smith.

7203.name: Secrets of the Obscure: Act 2 Mastery
7203.requirement: Complete  Secrets of the Obscure: Act 2 achievements.

7725.name: New Hero Jump Starter
7725.requirement: Complete  Hero's Origin achievements in the New Hero Jump Starter category.

7745.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Forty
7745.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty.

7776.name: Please Take a Seat
7776.description: But you'll only need the edge!
7776.requirement: Use the /sit emote at the edge of the western elevated cliffs in the Coliseum of the Midnight King.

7849.name: Artisan of Arms: Thief's Axe
7849.description: The thief's axe embeds itself in enemies, lingering until it is called back to inflict even more punishment.
7849.requirement: Defeat enemies with an axe as a thief.

7862.name: Going the Vertical Distance
7862.requirement: While under the effects of a Fool's Tall Tonic, complete laps of a roller beetle race or an adventure in Central Tyria.

8005.name: Fissure Walker
8005.requirement: Defeat Eparch in the Lonely Tower fractal without taking damage from his rage fissures.

8111.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Forty-Two
8111.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-Two.

8172.name: True Artist
8172.description: The finest galleries in Tyria are eager to meet you.
8172.requirement: Complete the "Paint titan footprints and bring them to Running Colors" event without painting an incorrect stroke.

8232.name: A Season for Work
8232.description: Hopefully the season for rest is soon.
8232.requirement: Spend 5 continuous minutes decorating your homestead in Ground Mode.

8237.name: Janthir Syntri Warclaw Run: Silver
8237.description: Get that cat some extra-special scritches.
8237.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Janthir Syntri Warclaw Run adventure.

8269.name: Seed Savvy
8269.requirement: Take no damage while carrying a seed.

8345.name: Rubbing Shoulders
8345.requirement: Mingle with all of the delegates before the meeting comes to session.

bits.text: Speak with Queen Jennah
Speak with Crecia
Speak with Dagonet
Speak with Ludo
Speak with Skarti

8350.name: Shield Trap
8350.description: The best offense is a good defense.
8350.requirement: Defeat a jade construct using the Astral Ward shield.

8426.name: Local Response: Desert Highlands
8426.requirement: Complete  events in Desert Highlands. Bounty events award additional progress.

8437.name: Mini Cuckoo Hatchling Collection
8437.requirement: Unlock all mini cuckoo hatchlings in your wardrobe.

8540.name: Revenge of the Claw of Jormag (Weekly)
8540.requirement: Participate in a successful siege of the Frost Citadel.

8544.name: True Sight Armor Collector
8544.description: Does not come with spectral agony.
8544.requirement:
Unlock  pieces of the True Sight armor set by crafting them or purchasing them from the Trading Post and binding them to you.

Unlocking one weight's skin unlocks the other weights' skins.

8581.name: No Geysers, No Problems
8581.description: A clean arena makes for an easier victory.
8581.requirement: Defeat Ura while the challenge mote is active without allowing any toxic geyser to erupt for more than 30 seconds.

8606.name: Be Free, Little Bot
8606.description: They can't see us. Quick, run for your life!
8606.requirement: Liberate a golem from its humanoid oppressors.

8622.name: Home Sweet Homestead: The Battle for Lion's Arch
8622.description: This homestead has friends, you dummies! You can't have it.
8622.requirement: Complete events during the Battle for Lion's Arch. Group events will award more progress.

8639.name: Legendary Steamshrieker's Court
8639.requirement: Defeat Ura while the challenge mote is active.

8698.name: Rolling Competitor: Shoreside Sprint (Weekly)
8698.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Southsun Cove. The final lap of a race event rewards extra progress. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8763.name: Undying Light
8763.description: A full party of five must participate in the fractal with challenge mode enabled from start to finish without dying.
8763.requirement: Complete the Kinfall fractal in challenge mode without anyone in your group being defeated.

8767.name: Separation Anxiety
8767.description: You can't just leave me behind.
8767.requirement: Successfully use your warclaw's Chain Pull to stop one of the titans from reaching the other in the "Keep the titans apart in order to defeat them" event.
